2. Sort the table by the "no in series" column in ascending order. This will allow us to compare titles based on their sequence number within the series.

5. Since "knight in retreat" has a lower sequence number than "knight strike", "knight in retreat" is indeed the title with the second highest "no in series" value.

Final answer:
